'''Al-Islah''' ({{lang-ar|Ø­Ø²Ø¨ Ø§ÙØ§ØµÙØ§Ø­}}) is a [[political party]] in [[Yemen]]. According to ''[[Al Jazeera]]'', its ideology is based on [[Islamism]]. One of its main leaders is [[Tawakel Karman]].
The party currently sits in opposition. It is agitating, at the moment, against a draft amendment to the [[constitution of Yemen]] that could allow the president to run for life. The party is also involved in organising demonstrations for the ongoing [[2011 Yemeni protests]].<ref>http://english.aljazeera.net/news/middleeast/2011/01/2011129112626339573.html</ref>
